question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. c. Democratic Coalition (PASOK & DIMAR)
raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of the Democratic Coalition (PASOK & DIMAR) because while I appreciate some of their policies and efforts, I also have concerns about their recent actions and effectiveness, which makes my support cautious but still generally positive.

ANSWER: B
